Acts_1-1.text: the first book I wrote theophilus concerned all that Jesus began both to do and to teach

Acts_1-10.text: he went behold two mins to buy them in white clothing

Acts_1-2.text: until the day in which he was received up after he had given commandment through the holy spirit to the apostles whom he had chosen

Acts_1-3.text: do these he also showed himself alive after he suffered by many proofs appearing to them over a period of 40 Days and speaking about God's kingdom

Acts_1-4.text: being assembled together with them he charged them don't depart from Jerusalem but wait for the promise of the Father which you heard from me

Acts_1-5.text: Virgin indeed baptised in water but you will be baptised in the Holy Spirit not many days from now

Acts_1-6.text: therefore when they had come together they asked him Lord are you now restoring the kingdom to Israel

Acts_1-7.text: he said to them it isn't for you to know times or Seasons which the father has set within his own authority

Acts_1-8.text: but you will receive power when the Holy Spirit has come upon you you will be Witnesses to me in Jerusalem in all Judea and Samaria into the uttermost parts of the Earth

Acts_1-9.text: when he had said these things as they were looking he was taken up in a Cloud received him out of their sight
